7.heading: Green, Aleister.
7.title: Aleister Arcane
7.author: written by Steve Niles ; art by Breehn Burns.
notes: Originally published in single magazine form as Aleister Arcane, issues 1-3.

"Aleister Green loves playing late night TV horror host Aleister Arcane in his hometown of Jackson, OK. But Jackon's establishment forces him off the air and into unhappy retirement, and an early grave. But Aleister has left a little gift behind, will Jackson ever be the same?"
